name: product-forge
description: Comprehensive product development toolkit with PRD management, task tracking, strategic planning, and secure technical implementation. Features CPO/CTO/Marketing/UX/DPO/DevOps/Data Engineering/RAG-CAG expertise, technical specialists (Django, FastAPI, FastMCP, React/TypeScript, Celery, Playwright), design system management, cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, Ansible), data transformation (dbt, SQLMesh), RAG/CAG architecture with multi-tenant security, MCP security with 5-layer defense, OAuth/OIDC, privacy compliance (GDPR/CCPA), and documentation-first workflows.
author: jpoutrin
